title: Getting a leaver penalty lol
body: So today i hop in queue expecting to play a normal game of league half way through picks and bans my game crashes and what do you know when i log back on BOOOM!!! a leaver penalty pops up....whats annoying is i never leave games and the first one i don just because my game crashes i get a penalty.. I know its five minutes but its still really annoying...

replies.body: I qued ranked and in room everyone baned and picked on then last 10 seconds to match 4 from my team left room but game still was going on(i was only one left) in midle of loading i got lol crashed tryed 10 ways of geting back to game but didnt work.Not only happend to me but alot of them from my town i got penalty  20 minutes.. I got moved from qualification for S2

Leaving champion select counts as a [queue dodge](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751844-Queue-Dodging), and will place you in a lower priority queue.  I'd like to help with this crash but need more details.  Are you receiving any errors and what does it say?  Were you trying to do anything like change your masteries around?  Anything can help!
I was picking my champion and all of the sudden my game stopped responding and then crashed.

Based on this information, I'm assuming that there may be some corrupt game files causing a crash.  I suggest going over our [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide which will provide a series of steps to troubleshoot.  That should get you fixed up!
